page.title: 10Me and My Home
page.content: I live in the country, on a croft.My mum is a housewife, and she looks after the animals. We have a dog, 3 cats, 6 kittens, 2 lambs, some hens, a few cockerels, a few ducks, 6 goats and a hamster! Sometimes I help rounding up the goats from the field, and give the hens scraps of food. I play with the kittens and my hamster. I always fight with my sisters and argue with my mum.I am the oldest in my family. Sometimes after school I go down to the mill where my dad works, and walk back home with him.Sometimes, I go for a ride down the lane on my bike, but most of the time I play with my sisters, Sally and Emma.
